content.title: eureka!
content.description: You have discovered kernel-image, a provider of experience-stimulating content and interactivity. Similar to the hidden component of a computer operating system, kernel-image works behind the scenes to mediate the flow of information between virtual desires and physical hardware. Feel free to look at the reel above or peruse other projects samples on the site.

content.title: Noggins ABCs
content.description: Series of literacy games developed for Paramount's educational platform, noggin, running on iOS and android. Implemented a global system that would adapt difficulty of content baed on performance across the platform, with custom tooling for production automations, including xAPI analytics event dispatching and data QA from around a million users. Lead interactive production from concepting through regression testing.

content.title: Noggins 123s
content.description: Series of math games developed for Paramount's educational platform, noggin, running on iOS and android. Implemented a global system that would adapt difficulty of content baed on performance across the platform, with custom tooling for production automations, including xAPI analytics event dispatching and data QA from around a million users. Lead interactive production from concepting through regression testing.

content.title: Nickelodeon Interactive 2020
content.description: Interactive content developed for mobile supporting Nick Jr IP.  The opener, Block Party: Pattern Quest  was a webby award honeree, while Blues Clues & You received an Emmy nomination for Outstanding Interactive Media.

content.title: Noggin Missions
content.description: Series of games developed for Paramount's educational platform, noggin, running on iOS and android. Implemented a global system that would adapt difficulty of content baed on performance across the platform, with custom tooling for production automations, including xAPI analytics event dispatching and data QA from around a million users.

content.title: Noggin Knows Books
content.description: Series of interactive books developed for Paramount's educational platform, noggin, running on iOS and android.  Built automation tools for graphics and interactive pipelines, lead interactive production.

content.title: 2020 3D / Motion
content.description: 3D, motion, video work for fashion, beauty, design, and tech spaces.

content.title: Blaze Play-Along-Video
content.description: Highlights from Blaze and the Monster Machines interactive iOS apps Five Alarm Blaze, Pickle Power, Mega Mud Robot, Knighty Knights, and The Wishing Wheel for Nickelodeon. Programmed gameplay in Unity.

content.title: Kernel-Image Card AR
content.description: AR business card activation for Android using Maya, Unity, and Vuforia.

content.title: 2014 3D / Motion
content.description: Highlights from older animation / rendering / compositing projects.

content.title: Midas VR
content.description: VR experience inspired by the mythical king with the touch of gold. Made with Maya and Unity, using Leap Motion for hand tracking.

content.title: Lil Club VR
content.description: Gaze-based navigation VR prototype made in Unreal Engine. Architectural design by Safwat Riad

content.title: Tot Cop Play-Along Video
content.description: Highlights from Nick Jr's interactive video series for mobile devices.  Developed with Unity.
